revised_title: A Study of the Development and Characteristics of Spark Discharges
tldr: This article investigates the development and characteristics of spark discharges using a rotating camera and an impulse-voltage generator. The authors discovered that spark discharges consist of two or more components, similar to a lightning flash. They studied the leader and main strokes of the spark discharge and found that the main stroke has a higher propagation velocity than the leader stroke. The authors also observed differences in discharge behavior when changing the polarity of the high-voltage electrode.
